title: Camille
body: guys, what if camille, the new champ, is actually 'C' from Caitlyn's lore????

replies.body:
Wouldn't be surprising. But Camille is more of a batman than anything.

Though ask me, she reminds me of this character

https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/8/83/Lin_Beifong.png
LOL I literally just thought you posted a random fan art of Camille

> LOL I literally just thought you posted a random fan art of Camille

did say she reminds me of her
